name: Mustache Max
description:
The name's Max, Mustache Max.

I'm the guy behind the scenes. The guy who gets his hands dirty so that evil masterminds don't have to. With the right connections, you can hire me to setup your dungeon, and heroes will never be tipped off. I ensure MAXimum discrepancy, and speed is my top priority.

  • Work as dungeon maintenance to connect all the lightbulbs
  • Work fast and get the HIGHSCORE
  • Move (arrows keys) and double jump (space bar)
  • Controller support is recommend if you have it!
  • TIP! - Press against the wall when you wall jump to spring away from wall.

Contributions

  • All music and art are original and created during the span of this game jam!
  • Developers
    • Bryant Hayes (dev)
    • Max Schweitzer (dev)
    • Ryan Zmolek (music)
      • If you like the music check out Ryan’s Spotify profile! https://open.spotify.com/artist/5G2Ryf3A6nHBhODMZ46pnz?si=gtk4kCWFRn6iePqGVf69ZQ
